query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_guides, SUM(CASE WHEN heroImage IS NOT NULL AND heroImage != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_images, SUM(CASE WHEN heroImage IS NULL OR heroImage = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_images FROM island_guides
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_guides, SUM(CASE WHEN heroImage IS NOT NULL AND heroImage != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_images, SUM(CASE WHEN heroImage IS NULL OR heroImage = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_images FROM island_guides
